summary.intent: Merge origin/main into the current branch and resolve conflicts in manual_commit_git.go that arose from concurrent changes to session initialization.
summary.outcome: Successfully resolved merge conflicts by combining two independent changes: the branch's resolveAgentType helper fix and origin/main's addition of a userPrompt parameter to initializeSession. Verified resolution compiles cleanly.

repo: gopls re-indexes asynchronously after edits, so LSP diagnostics may appear stale immediately after conflict resolution
The codebase convention is to verify builds with `go build ./...` after resolving conflicts
Session initialization in manual_commit_git.go requires a userPrompt parameter (empty string for manual commit strategy)

code.finding: resolveAgentType() helper was added to fix agent name misattribution in the manual commit strategy
initializeSession signature changed to include userPrompt parameter, which manual_commit_git passes as empty string

workflow: When resolving conflicts with independent changes to the same area, identify which side contributes each distinct feature and combine both
Build verification after conflict resolution catches integration issues that text-based conflict markers miss

friction: LSP diagnostics showing stale errors after conflict resolution can be confusing until understanding the async re-indexing behavior
open_items: User deferred decision on whether to run full test suite (mise run fmt && mise run lint && mise run test:ci) before committing the merge
